ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Game loading faster
ygData.msgSnippet: My computer takes about 5-7 minutes to load from the char select screen. I have 1gb ram, with an amd processor ( running win 2000 ) lol i was cheap, but it
ygData.messageBody:
My computer takes about 5-7 minutes to load from the char select screen. I have 1gb ram, with an amd processor ( running win 2000 ) lol i was cheap, but it works. However I am on dialup, as there isnt anything faster or better in my area yet, tho i hear wi-fi is coming so....<crossing fingers>. The huige wait tho, sometimes longer than the actual loading, is zoning into PoK. It is is horribley long wait...worse if the character i want to play is camped there...so until there is a change..I seldom go there now ort camp there. I have a pocket cleric and chanter to temp/ virtue and kei, me in nexus, so al is good.
 
Tho I do have an issue with PoK..am I the only one that has to run around PoK loking at their feet and suing the map so not to run into stuff? The lag there, most times ( early morn seems to be best) is very bad...

"Steven R. Hulse" <steven.hulse@...> wrote:
Dang Su, what's the stats on your PC? I think mine takes about 5 minutes to
load.

Here's what I have...

eMachines W3050 Wal*Mart special (Hey, it was cheap and I needed something
bad)

2Ghz AMD processor
2GB Ram (upgraded from 512)
80GB HD
10GB HD (Added)

I have the OS (WinXP Pro, it came with Home) loaded on the 10GB drive and
the 80 GB drive partitioned off with a 5GB partition dedicated as a swap or
paging file.

Granted this probably helps me load faster but can be a real headache to
configure for the average computer user who doesn't want to mess with all
that. Also when was the last time you defragged? That could help some.

Durgaa

Subject: Re: Re: Game loading faster

Since it takes me 20 minutes to load I tend to just walk away during that
part. :-)
luv,
